properties.name: airline-api.dev.super-admin-token
properties.description: A token for testing purposes in a BCrypt encrypted format

properties.name: airline-api.mail.host
properties.description: The host for the email sender

properties.name: airline-api.mail.username
properties.description: The username to login to the email sender server

properties.name: airline-api.mail.password
properties.description: The password to login to the email sender server

properties.name: airline-api.mail.smtp.use-auth
properties.description: Additional properties for the email sender

properties.name: airline-api.mail.smtp.use-tls
properties.description: Additional properties for the email sender

properties.name: airline-api.jwt.expiration
properties.description: The expiration time for the generated Json Web Tokens in seconds

properties.name: airline-api.cors.allow-origins
properties.description: Allowed origins from where to allow incoming requests
